purpose: To educate and guide users through the process of understanding and implementing Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) techniques.
principle: The guide leverages RAG methodology, combining retrieval of relevant information with generative AI models to enhance response accuracy and relevance.
reusability: The guide is structured as a series of Jupyter Notebooks, allowing users to interactively engage with the content, modify examples, and apply concepts to their own projects.
limitations: Being a guide, it requires users to have a basic understanding of AI and programming. It does not provide a ready-to-deploy solution but rather educational content.
name: rag-zero-to-hero-guide
description: Comprehensive guide to learn RAG from basics to advanced.
highlight: Comprehensive guide to mastering Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) from foundational concepts to advanced implementations.
